TopicTitle: Hey! People at the Reddit AMA!

Articles.Content:
So I don't have a reddit account, but would really like to ask one of the devs a question. Could one of you fine Kerbonauts ask my question for me?

It goes as follows: What ever happened to Nova? Is he still on leave, or has he quit/been laid off?

Thanks in advance, hopefully.

Thanks For Reading,

Happy Flying!
